name: HELTH
description:
You are a scientist who is trying to save the world from a deadly plague! Use the arrow keys or W, A, S, D to explore the lab and collect elements to make a vaccine. Return to the main lab to create the vaccine and save humanity!

This game was created to raise awareness for vaccines. Only 49.7% of the US population(2021) has been vaccinated for Covid19, and the (Pfizer-BioNTech) vaccine has proved to be 95% effective in preventing this virus. 

------------------------------------------------------

HELTH was created by the Hacker Noobs team:

Manager: Carrington H   
Coders: Taylor A and Carrington H    
Artists: Aurora W, April D, and Jasmine V    
Musician: Kendall J    
Sound effects: Aliyah M    
Presenters and Researchers: Alizjah, Brooke, and Desiree

This game was made with Unity Bolt. Thank you for playing!
